channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Calendar

item.title: CVE-2017-15891|2024-09-16T20:46:59.679Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SYNO.Cal.EventBase in Synology Calendar before 2.0.1-0242 allows remote authenticated users to modify calendar event via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27617|2024-09-16T22:55:31.383Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Calendar before 2.3.4-0631 allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22686|2024-09-16T19:14:33.307Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Calendar before 2.3.4-0631 allows remote authenticated users to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
